page.title: 18HEALTH - DOCTOR/DENTIST ETC.
page.content: Because this area has such a low population and so few dwellings, the residents have to go to nearby villages and towns for the services of doctors, dentists, opticians and chiropodists. The nearby village of Chiseldon has a newly built health centre, housing the practice of several doctors and providing pharmacy facilities. There are doctors, dentists, opticians and chiropodists in several of the larger villages and towns, all within 10 miles of the Upper Upham district, such as Wroughton, Swindon and Marlborough. There are several hospitals within 10 miles, including Princess Margarets and The Victoria Hospital in Swindon, Princess Alexandra RAF Hospital and The Ridgeway (private) in Wroughton and a cottage hospital in Marlborough.
